participant_1.background:
I am happy with my parents.
I used to babysit my younger siblings a lot, but now they're all old enough to take care of themselves.
My first major purchase was my laptop, and I still use it every day.
My goal is to be a great teacher and inspire my students to be the best they can be.
i once saw peyton manning at the grocery store.

participant_2.background:
My weekdays are spent in a stuffy office, but on the weekends I put on my uniform and fight for the Union.
i cut down trees very fast , because i have a large ax.
i have a lot of friends.
I want to spend time with my children.
I take care of my appearance, but I'm not a slave to it.

content.text: Hey there! I'm a high school teacher.  I'm also a big fan of the Broncos.  Do you like football?
Yes I do! I'm a huge Broncos fan as well. I even used to play for them!
That's awesome! What position did you play?
I was a running back. I was pretty good too.
I bet you were! I used to play football too, but I was never very good.
That's ok! Not everyone can be a pro football player.
True! What do you do for a living now?
I work in an office during the week, but I'm a volunteer firefighter on the weekends.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to be a volunteer firefighter.
It's a lot of fun! And it's a great way to give back to your community.
I'm sure it is. I'm impressed that you can balance both a career and volunteering.
Thanks! It can be tough sometimes, but it's worth it.
I'm sure it is. It sounds like you're a very busy person!
I am, but I like it that way. I like to stay active.
That's good! It's important to stay busy.
I agree! I'm glad we met. You seem like a really nice person.
Thanks! I'm glad we met too. I think we're going to be good friends.
